name: copilot-anywhere
description: Bridge GitHub Copilot Chat with external clients via HTTP & SSE (real-time proxy).

copilotAnywhere.server.port.description: Port for the local HTTP/SSE server that external clients connect to.

copilotAnywhere.server.host.description: Host interface for the local HTTP/SSE server. Use 0.0.0.0 to accept external connections.

copilotAnywhere.security.allowOrigins.description: Allowed Origins for CORS (array of origin strings). Use * for all (dev only).

copilotAnywhere.http.autoInvoke.description: Automatically invoke the Copilot model for prompts received via HTTP /message.

copilotAnywhere.http.injectIntoChat.description: Inject HTTP prompts directly into the Copilot Chat input (as @CopilotAnywhere <prompt>) instead of auto invoking.

copilotAnywhere.http.autoSubmit.description: When injecting into chat, automatically submit the prompt after insertion.

copilotAnywhere.agent.enabled.description: Enable internal autonomous agent loop that can read and write files via structured tool calls.

copilotAnywhere.agent.maxSteps.description: Maximum iterative reasoning/tool steps per agent run.

copilotAnywhere.agent.allowedRoots.description: File or directory roots the agent is allowed to access/edit.

copilotAnywhere.agent.requireApproval.description: If true, prompt for user approval before applying each file edit.

copilotAnywhere.agent.prefix.description: If a chat prompt to @CopilotAnywhere starts with this prefix, it will invoke the autonomous agent loop instead of a single model response.
